Main Module¶

Main script for PAC4 - Student Performance in Catalonia. This script runs all the required analyses and functionalities for the assignment.

src.main.main()¶

Main entry point for PAC4. Parses command-line arguments and runs the requested exercises.

src.main.run_exercise_1()¶

Load both datasets and perform exploratory data analysis (EDA).

Returns:

  • df_perf (pd.DataFrame) – Performance dataset.

  • df_aband (pd.DataFrame) – Abandonment dataset.

src.main.run_exercise_2(df_perf, df_aband)¶

Clean, harmonize, group, and merge the datasets for further analysis. :type df_perf: :param df_perf: Performance dataset. :type df_perf: pd.DataFrame :type df_aband: :param df_aband: Abandonment dataset. :type df_aband: pd.DataFrame

Returns:

Merged dataset ready for analysis.

Return type:

merged (pd.DataFrame)

src.main.run_exercise_3(merged)¶

Generate and save time series visualizations for abandonment and performance rates by branch. :type merged: :param merged: Merged dataset. :type merged: pd.DataFrame

src.main.run_exercise_4(merged)¶

Perform statistical analysis and save results as a JSON report. :type merged: :param merged: Merged dataset. :type merged: pd.DataFrame
